an9.64:2.1: Imesam kho, bhikkhave, pancannam nivarananam pahanaya cattaro satipatthana bhavetabba.
an9.64:2.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kaye kayanupassi viharati atapi sampajano satima vineyya loke abhijjhadomanassam;
an9.64:2.6: dhammesu dhammanupassi viharati atapi sampajano satima vineyya loke abhijjhadomanassam.
an9.64:2.7: Imesam kho, bhikkhave, pancannam nivarananam pahanaya ime cattaro satipatthana bhavetabba”ti.
